pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa dhammaṁ desenti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.3.1_0: “Na uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.4_0: Na uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammo desetabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk72:1.5_0: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa agilānassa dhammaṁ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
